  16. ‌let preload_objects = ref []

  18. (* Position of the first non expanded argument *)
  19. ‌let first_nonexpanded_pos = ref 0

  21. ‌let current = ref (!Arg.current)

  23. ‌let argv = ref Sys.argv

  25. (* Test whether the option is part of a responsefile *)
  26. ‌let is_expanded pos = pos < !first_nonexpanded_pos

  28. ‌let expand_position pos len =
  29.   if pos < !first_nonexpanded_pos then
  30.     (* Shift the position *)
  31.     first_nonexpanded_pos := !first_nonexpanded_pos + len
  32.   else
  33.     (* New last position *)
  34.     first_nonexpanded_pos := pos + len + 2


  37. ‌let prepare ppf =
  38.   Topcommon.set_paths ();
  39.   try
  40.     let res =
  41.       List.for_all (Topeval.load_file false ppf) (List.rev !preload_objects)
  42.     in
  43.     Topcommon.run_hooks Topcommon.Startup;
  44.     res
  45.   with x ->
  46.     try Location.report_exception ppf x; false
  47.     with x ->
  48.       Format.fprintf ppf "Uncaught exception: %s\n" (Printexc.to_string x);
  49.       false

  51. ‌let input_argument name =
  52.   let filename = Toploop.filename_of_input name in
  53.   let ppf = Format.err_formatter in
  54.   if Filename.check_suffix filename ".cmxs"
  55.     || Filename.check_suffix filename ".cmx"
  56.     || Filename.check_suffix filename ".cmxa"
  57.   then preload_objects := filename :: !preload_objects
  58.   else if is_expanded !current then begin
  59.     (* Script files are not allowed in expand options because otherwise the
  60.        check in override arguments may fail since the new argv can be larger
  61.        than the original argv.
  62.     *)
  63.     Printf.eprintf "For implementation reasons, the toplevel does not support\
  64.     \ having script files (here %S) inside expanded arguments passed through\
  65.     \ the -args{,0} command-line option.\n" filename;
  66.     raise (Compenv.Exit_with_status 2)
  67.   end else begin
  68. ‌    let newargs = Array.sub !argv !Arg.current
  69.                               (Array.length !argv - !Arg.current)
  70.       in
  71.       Compmisc.read_clflags_from_env ();
  72.       if prepare ppf && Toploop.run_script ppf name newargs
  73.       then raise (Compenv.Exit_with_status 0)
  74.       else raise (Compenv.Exit_with_status 2)
  75.     end

  77. ‌let file_argument x = input_argument (Toploop.File x)

  79. ‌let wrap_expand f s =
  80.   let start = !current in
  81.   let arr = f s in
  82.   expand_position start (Array.length arr);
  83.   arr

  85. module Options = Main_args.Make_opttop_options (struct
  86.     include Main_args.Default.Opttopmain
  87.     let _stdin () = input_argument Toploop.Stdin
  88.     let _args = wrap_expand Arg.read_arg
  89.     let _args0 = wrap_expand Arg.read_arg0
  90. ‌    let anonymous s = file_argument s
  91.     let _eval s = input_argument (Toploop.String s)

  93. end)

  95. ‌let main () =
  96.   let ppf = Format.err_formatter in
  97.   Clflags.native_code := true;
  98.   let program = "ocamlnat" in
  99.   let display_deprecated_script_alert =
  100.     Array.length !argv >= 2 && Topcommon.is_command_like_name !argv.(1)
  101.   in
  102.   Topcommon.update_search_path_from_env ();
  103.   Compenv.readenv ppf Before_args;
  104.   if display_deprecated_script_alert then
  105.     Location.deprecated_script_alert program;
  106.   Clflags.add_arguments __LOC__ Options.list;
  107.   Compenv.parse_arguments ~current argv file_argument program;
  108.   Compmisc.read_clflags_from_env ();
  109.   if not (prepare Format.err_formatter) then raise (Compenv.Exit_with_status 2);
  110.   Compmisc.init_path ();
  111.   Toploop.loop Format.std_formatter

  113. ‌let main () =
  114.   match main () with
  115.   | exception Compenv.Exit_with_status n -> n
  116.   | () -> 0
